help-file.title: GIVE
help-file.content:
Syntax: give <object> <target>
If you feel charitable, you may want to give items to someone in need.
Example: "give bread beggar"
Money, in the form of various types of coinage, is a little more difficult to give away.
Syntax: give <amount> <coin_type> <target>
Giving very heavy objects, or 1000s of coins, or anything that will overload the receiver, requires the receiver's consent.
